genesis.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the beginning or origin of something
genesis.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the first book of the Old Testament of the Bible, which describes the history of the Earth and its people. It includes the creation of Heaven and the Earth, the story of Adam and Eve and, and the story of the flood. Many people know the first words of Genesis
genesis.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
